data.description: Examination of current artists' motivations, intentions, and processes and their relationship to general developments in contemporary art.
data.title: CURRENT DIRECTIONS IN ART

data.description: Advanced work and examination of the percepts of drawing with the human figure. Emphasis on conceptual development in conversation with contemporary life drawing practices.
data.title: ADVANCED LIFE DRAWING II

data.description: Anatomical structure and intrinsic forms involved in drawing from different models. Development of technical control in a range of media.
data.title: LIFE DRAWING I

data.description: Apply the elements of drawing to more exploratory drawing methods and explore a wide variety of drawing concepts and applications in the context of Modern and Contemporary Art. Provides foundational skillsets for drawing and painting, printmaking and book art.
data.title: DRAWING FOUNDATIONS

data.description: Further examination of the percepts of drawing with the human figure. Emphasis on formal elements. Problems of structure. Intense studio practice working from the model.
data.title: ADVANCED LIFE DRAWING I

data.description: Further investigation into anatomical structure and intrinsic forms involved in drawing from different models. Development of concepts and technique.
data.title: LIFE DRAWING II

data.description: Introduction to basic drawing. Core elements of drawing such as the use of line, shape, composition, space, perspective, value, and texture. Provides foundational skillsets for drawing.
data.title: DRAWING FOR NON-ART MAJORS
